mapper.select:
select b.id brandId,b.brand_name brand,b.avator,c.cover preview,c.title,p.price,c.id,p.sbu,ifnull(b.blue_end_at > now(),0) enableBlue,b.mark brandMark from cell c inner join brand b on c.brand_id = b.id inner join pricing p on c.id = p.cell_id
1=1 AND c.mark = '2'
AND (locate(#{dto.q}, b.brand_name)>0 or locate(#{dto.q}, c.title)>0 or locate(#{dto.q}, c.tags)>0)
AND p.price >= #{dto.budgetMin}
AND p.price <= #{dto.budgetMax}
AND p.sbu = #{dto.sbu}
AND locate(#{dto.location}, b.location)>0
AND b.mark='3'
Order by c.create_At desc
Order by p.price desc
Order by p.price asc

select c.product_desc, c.mark cellMark,c.tags, c.title, c.id, c.cover, c.provide_invoice, c.intro_cover,b.id brandId,b.brand_name brand,b.avator,b.wechat,b.phone,b.email,c.content,p.price,p.sbu,b.mark brandMark from cell c inner join brand b on c.brand_id = b.id inner join pricing p on c.id = p.cell_id where c.id = #{id}

select b.id brandId,b.brand_name brand,b.avator,c.cover preview,c.title,p.price,c.id,p.sbu from cell c inner join brand b on c.brand_id = b.id inner join pricing p on c.id = p.cell_id where b.id = #{dto.brandId} and p.sbu = #{dto.sbu} and c.mark ='2'
AND locate(#{dto.q}, c.title)>0

select b.handle, c.cover cellCover,b.avator brandAvatar,b.brand_name brandName, b.id brandId,c.id cellId,c.title cellTitle,i.impressions views from cell c inner join brand b on c.brand_id = b.id inner join cell_indices i on i.cell_id=c.id where c.mark = '2' Order by c.create_At desc limit 24
